author: automotivetestingtechnologyinternational.com
title: Latest News : Automotive Testing Technology International
text:
SHOW LIVE: Re-Sol presents latest fuel system solutions
At booth 11055 where Re-Sol are exhibiting, there are two new products on display including the RS955 Series mobile automatic calibration system (pictured) and the RS 481 mobile high flow system for heavy duty applications.
The RS955 is mobile and compact, and contains a fuel tank, boost pump and a NIST traceable master meter. It can be easily interfaced with any computer or company network. President Peter Kaub, says, "The user can preset the test conditions for the system and these will run automatically so he/she can do something different while the test is running; this usually takes as long as two hours."
Meanwhile, Re-Sol's high flow diesel measurement system goes up to 47kg per hour and has two meters and two pumps onboard for large diesel applications. Itâ€™s also very mobile meaning it can be wheeled from one test cell to another.
